___min.description: Returns the minimum value of values in the attribute key.
___min.title: min

___push.description: Adds value val to the attribute key.
___push.title: push

___stddev.description: Returns the standard deviation of values in the attribute key.
___stddev.title: stddev

___max.description: Returns the maximum value of values in the attribute key.
___max.title: max

___sum.description: Returns the sum of values in the attribute key.
___sum.title: sum

___entropy.description: Returns the entropy of values in the attribute key.
___entropy.title: entropy

___moment.description: Returns the degree-th moment about center of values in the attribute key.
___moment.title: moment
